[Home](./index.md) &gt; [forms42core](./forms42core.md) &gt; [Form](./forms42core.form.md)

## Form class

The form object links html and business logic.

A form consists of blocks that links to backend data. The form can hold all necessary code, LOV's etc. But in general generic code for blocks should be put at the block level to ensure reuse.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Form implements CanvasComponent 
```
**Implements:** CanvasComponent

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(page)](./forms42core.form._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new Form instance. |
